name: BABEL (SplitSuns, RuneRaven, 100blossoms, SleeplessSummer, coffeegrinder)
description:
[A visual novel made for Northeastern University's Slice of Jam 2023.] 

"Welcome aboard the PANDORA!" You are an AI customer agent aboard a luxury space cruise for the rich and privileged. After an unknown incident, you awake to find it abandoned, desolate and full of a strange black mucus. Separated from both your masters and your memories, can you uncover what tragedy has befallen your ship?

Credits:
Prima Sun: scenario, writing, misc. art
Tiffany Chen: programming, sprites
Lesley Chen: programming, sprites
Alex Ouyang: programming, backgrounds
Eddie Jones: music, sound design
